title: Wishlist Item
description: Schema for wishlist items stored in the app (v2 schema with normalizedUrl)

id.description: Unique identifier for the wishlist item

image.description: URL of the item image (can be null)

price.description: Price information if available (can be null)

currency.description: Currency code for the price (can be null)

siteName.description: Name of the website or store (can be null)

createdAt.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when the item was created

updatedAt.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when the item was last updated
